issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:

fields.summary: Worker exists frequently due to java.net.SocketTimeoutException

comments.body:
[~kraks],

I think this is the worker and not the supervisor that is crashing.

Its both actually, I have provided the error that I see in  supervisor.log in the issue description just below the worker log stack trace.

we run storm-supervisor with supervisord, with 999 retries but it wont comeback.
However, if we clear the supervisor state by clearing the folders/files under storm/supervisor and start the supervisor it comes back
